name: Comet Me, Bro
description:
- Collect items back to your planet!

- Player 1: Use A and D to move and w to change gravity

- Player 2: use ← and → arrow keys to move and ↑ to change gravity

- Collect more items than your opponent to win!

- You can steal items from your opponent's base too

- Stealing an item from your opponent while they are 
  holding it will cause your opponent to get stunned

This game is made for VimJam 2020.

This is our first game so please give us feedback.

Play it in Full Screen!!

Thanks for Playing!!!
